sentences.english: ObjectiveTo study the therapeutic efficacy of diclofenac sodium suppositories in renal colic caused by calculus.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解双氯芬酸钠栓剂对结石性肾绞痛的治疗效果。

sentences.english: METHODS To study the preparation and establish the quality standard of the pessary .
sentences.chinese: 方法研究该栓剂的制备方法，建立质量标准和稳定性。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To develop the preparation of ornidazole suppository and establish the quality standard.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立奥硝唑栓剂的制备方法及质量控制标准。

sentences.english: Objective To prepare ornidazole suppository and establish the quality standard for the treatment of periodontitis.
sentences.chinese: 目的制备奥硝唑牙科用栓剂，并建立质量控制标准。

sentences.english: How do I use this suppositories?
The TZGZR suppositories vacuum emulsifier is evaluated the city level technological award.
sentences.chinese: 的TZGZR栓剂真空乳化评价城市一级的技术奖。

sentences.english: Econazole nitrate in the microcapsule had a slower release rate than that in the suppository.
sentences.chinese: 与栓剂相比，硝酸益康唑微胶囊释放速度缓慢。

sentences.english: Suppositories are known to be the most effective choice.
sentences.chinese: 栓剂是目前为止最有效用哦。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE The paper was studied on the production and quality management of compound ornidazole suppository .
sentences.chinese: 目的研究复方奥硝唑栓剂的制备及质量控制标准。

sentences.english: Objective To study the toxic effects of compound tinidazole suppository on domestic rabbits.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究复方替硝唑栓剂对家兔的毒性作用。

sentences.english: To prepare different bases of rifampicin(RFP) suppositories and to check its quality.
sentences.chinese: 制备不同基质的利福平栓剂并进行质量考察。

sentences.english: Objective To study the anti-diarrhea effect of Lucao suppository.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究律草栓剂的止泻作用。

sentences.english: Conclusion Lucao suppository has obvious anti-diarrhea effect.
sentences.chinese: 结论律草栓剂有明显的止泻作用。

sentences.english: Objective Determine antibacterial activity and the clinical significance in vitro of compound tinidazole suppository.
sentences.chinese: 目的测定复方替硝唑栓剂的体外抗菌活性及临床意义。

sentences.english: How do I use this suppository?
Conclusion The standard of quality can control the quality of suppository.
sentences.chinese: 结论质量标准可以有效控制栓剂的质量。

definition: metronidazole, clotrimazole and chlorhexidine acetate (as suppository)
vaginal infection/inflammation of the vulva or vagina/colpitis
medicine to be taken after being mixed with water (or other liquid)
